name: Infinity Beats
description:
Featuring with hundreds of drum patterns and high quality drum sounds, it's just like playing on a real drum kit, except you don’t have to remember anything!
You goal is simple but challenging - get as many combos as you can and show the world that you are the ultimate rhythm master!

Features:
- Endless stage. There is no limit to how well you can play.
- High quality drum kit sounds and real drum patterns in sync with every input.
- Various speed (BPM) from relaxing to intense.
- Dynamic arranged endless music.
- Beautiful space environment with 4 different themes.
- 3 game modes:
- Two-Key mode.
- Five-Key landscape mode.
- Five-Key portrait mode. (iPad only)
- 2 random modes.
- 22 challenging achievements.
- Global leaderboards. Try to get to the top!
